title: Fort Washington Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets         Chloe is properly on her leash and ready to have fun in the park! Elizabeth Jackson/NPS Photo   Domestic Pets are allowed in all outdoor park areas, including the parade ground and bastions of the old fort. All pets must be on a leash and under the control by their owner at all times. Pets are not allowed in the visitor center or the barracks buildings of the old fort with the exception of service animals. Please pick up after your pet and dispose of any waste properly.
